content: निवस् {vI.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To live, dwell, stay; आहो निवत्स्यति समं हरिणांगनाभिः <ls>Ś. 1. 26</ls>; निवसिष्यसि मय्येव <ls>Bg. 12. 8.</ls> {@--2@} To be, exist; <ls>Pt. 1. 31.</ls> {@--3@} To occupy, settle in, take possession of. {@--4@} To sojourn, pass the night. {vII.v} {c2c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To dress, wear or put on clothes. {@--2@} To change one's clothes.
